CustomField.formula: CASE( MONTH( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ), 1,-(5/24), 2,-(5/24), 12,-(5/24), 4,-(4/24), 5,-(4/24), 6,-(4/24), 7,-(4/24), 8,-(4/24), 9,-(4/24), 10,-(4/24), 3, IF(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) - FLOOR(MOD((CreatedDate - $System.OriginDateTime +1),7)) >= 8 ,-(4/24),-(5/24)), 11, IF(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) - FLOOR(MOD((CreatedDate - $System.OriginDateTime +1),7)) < 1 ,-(4/24),-(5/24)),0 )
CustomField.label: EST Modifier
